channel.title: Authors on Pengpeng Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Pengpeng Liu

item.description: I am currently a Ph.D. student in Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK), supervised by Prof. Michael R. Lyu and Prof. Irwin King. Before that, I got the B.Eng. degree in the Department of Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University. My research interests include computer vision, deep learning and machine learning. Our 3D face reconstruction paper is accepted by ACCV 2020 as oral presentation. Our Flow2Stereo is accepted by CVPR 2020.
